name: Koholasaurus
title: Koholasaurus: Spiritway
desc: Only the Koholasaurs — and some adults from the People of the Springs who have mastered a variety of different skills — are able to use the Spiritways with unfettered facility, swiftly traversing these pathways of constantly flowing phlogiston...

skills.desc: Technique: Spiritway Usage(s): 2 (A character can only equip 1 Technique at a time)
